    • isNumeric

      public static boolean isNumeric​(java.lang.String strNum)
      checks if the passed parameter strNum is numeric.
      Parameters:
      strNum - contains string which needs to be checked
      Returns:
      boolean returns true if the string is numeric, returns false otherwise.

    • createBibItemFromInput

      public BibItem createBibItemFromInput()
      Inputs common attributes ie. authorName, title and yearPublished through the console, creates a default BibItem from them, and returning the same.
      Specified by:
      createBibItemFromInput in interface ItemInputStrategy
      Returns:
      BibItem returns default BibItem created using common attributes.
